ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are thankful to Pierre De Wit and three anonymous reviewers for feedback on earlier versions of this manuscript. We thank Alvaro Hernandez and John Cheeseman for assistance with transcriptome sequencing, which was performed at the Keck Center at the University of Illinois. Transcriptomic data were analyzed using high‚Äêperformance computing resources provided by Louisiana State University ( http://www.hpc.lsu.edu).
